LanguageData.KnowledgeFromStudyDesc: The type and amount of anomaly knowledge that can be obtained when this entity is studied. More sophisticated entities can unlock more advanced anomaly research projects.
LanguageData.StudyFrequencyDesc: The duration between available study periods for this entity.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_Regeneration_Desc: A flat amount of healing per day.
LanguageData.StatsReport_BioferriteGeneration_Desc: How much bioferrite this entity generates per day. When captured on a holding platform, bioferrite can be gathered from it by building a bioferrite harvester.
LanguageData.StatsReport_Offering_Desc: The ingredients required to perform the psychic ritual.
LanguageData.StatsReport_RitualDuration_Desc: The time it takes to perform this ritual.
LanguageData.StatsReport_RitualCooldown_Desc: After a ritual is performed, it disrupts ambient psychic energy for a period of time. During this time, the ritual can't be performed again.
LanguageData.StatsReport_ContainmentStrengthOffset_De: How much this affects the ability of a holding platform to constrain an entity. Entities that are better contained are less likely to escape and provide more knowledge when studied.
LanguageData.StatsReport_SerumDuration_Desc: How long the effects of a serum last.
